statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-12 \, x^{3} - 10 \, x^{2} - 12 \, x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3 , -5 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} + 5 \, x - 4 , -6 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 1 , -6 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} - 6 \, x - 3\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
